content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! Just got off work and I'm relaxing before I head out to propose to my girlfriend.
Oh my gosh! That is so exciting! Congratulations!
Thank you! I'm really nervous, but I'm also really excited.
I'm sure she'll say yes! You seem like a great guy and she's lucky to have you.
I hope so! I've been planning this for a while and I really want it to go well.
I'm sure it will! Just be yourself and let her know how much you love her.
Thank you for the advice! I'm going to go get ready now.
Good luck! I'm sure she'll say yes!
Tell me how it goes later!
